data.name: Apartment with Garden - Disney & Paris
reviews: Location ₪1,962 Show price breakdown for 4 nights ₪1,962 for 4 nights 4.99 · 154 reviews Rated 4.99 out of 5 from 154 reviews. Reserve Entire rental unit in Serris, France 4 guests · · 1 bedroom · · 2 beds · · 1 bath Guest favorite One of the most loved homes on Airbnb, according to guests Rated 4.99 out of 5 stars. 4.99 154 reviews 154 Reviews Hosted by Jessica Superhost · · 2 years hosting Listing highlights Top 1% of homes This home is one of the highest ranked based on ratings, reviews, and reliability. Self check-in Check yourself in with the lockbox. Free cancellation before December 2 Get a full refund if you change your mind. Some info has been automatically translated. Show original Treat yourself to a comfortable stay in this spacious and modern accommodation located just minutes from Disney and close to Val d'Europe. Perfect for a stay with families or friends, this apartment combines calm, convenience and comfort. Disney Park is a 7-minute drive, a 23-minute walk, or an 8-minute bus ride. RER A near the apartment to get to Paris. Book now for a stress-free stay. 3-star home ⭐️⭐️⭐️ The space Welcome to the "Central Park" apartment, conveniently located a stone's throw from Val d'Europe, Vallée Village and a few minutes from Disneyland Paris! An ideal location to combine relaxation, shopping and Disney magic! Enjoy comfortable, modern and perfectly equipped accommodation for your stays with family, friends or for professional purposes. Fully equipped accommodation at your disposal, with a private garden (ground floor accommodation) Secure residence, a parking space is dedicated to you in the basement at no extra charge. The apartment can accommodate up to 4 people, with the possibility of an extra bed for children under 2 years old (cot with mattress). It has a master bedroom with a 160cm bed. A living room with a sofa bed 150cm. A crib and high chair are available upon request during booking. Provision in the accommodation of books, coloring books and various games to occupy the little ones but also the older ones 😊 Bathroom with everything you need (towel, shower gel, shampoo, after shampoo, etc.). A fully equipped kitchen with everything you need (coffee, tea, sugar, salt, oil etc...) A private garden completes this property with a dining area and chill out space. A private underground parking space (maximum ⚠️ height 2m). Heating and fan present in the accommodation (fan available only during the summer period). Sheets (beds made), towels and basic amenities are provided. Although this home is accessible to people with reduced mobility (PMR), it lacks some essential amenities to ensure their comfort and autonomy. A welcome booklet is available in the listing to help you make the most of your stay. You will find all the useful information about the accommodation as well as our good addresses of restaurants, bakeries, shops and activities located nearby. This accommodation is rated 3 stars ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ Guest access Entire home is available for your use. Note that the parking space is available during your rental (from 2 p.m. on the day of arrival and until 11 a.m. on the day of your departure - maximum height 2 m) Other things to note Self check-in by lockbox, the code will be sent to you on the day of your arrival when the accommodation is ready to welcome you. You'll have check-in instructions via Airbnb directly in the "Your Reservation" section the day before or the morning of your arrival. Party organization prohibited. No additional guests allowed In order to preserve the tranquility of all, we remind you of the importance of respecting quiet hours, especially in the evening and early morning.
